description: The VAR_PHENOTYPES table contains the external phenotype identifier and the system that defined it.

columns.name: VARIANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the variant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PHENOTYPE_SYSTEM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The coding system category ID for the phenotype.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


MEDGEN


OMIM


SNOMED CT


HPO


ICD-9-CM


ICD-10-CM

columns.name: PHENOTYPE_CODE
columns.description: The external phenotype code assigned by the phenotype coding system.

columns.name: PHENOTYPE_NAME
columns.description: Phenotype name of phenotypes associated with the variant

columns.name: MODE_OF_INHERITANCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mode of inheritance category ID for the phenotype associated with the variant


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Autosomal dominant inheritance


Autosomal dominant inheritance with maternal imprinting


Autosomal dominant inheritance with paternal imprinting


Autosomal recessive inheritance


Autosomal unknown


Codominant


Genetic anticipation


Mitochondrial inheritance


Multifactorial inheritance


Oligogenic inheritance


Sex-limited autosomal dominant


Somatic mutation


Sporadic


Unknown mechanism


X-linked dominant inheritance


X-linked inheritance


X-linked recessive inheritance


Y-linked inheritance


Other
